displaytitle: Angels and a Male Figure in Clouds
medium: Pen and brown ink and brush and brown wash heightened with white gouache, with possible corrections to drawing in white gouache, over black chalk, on tan lunette-shaped paper
creditline: Gift of Emily Townsend Vermeule, honorary degree holder of the Class of 1989 and Cornelius Clarkson Vermeule III, in memory of Alphaeus Hyatt Mayor, Class of 1922, George Rodney Meneely, Class of 1933, and Cornelius Clarkson Vermeule, Jr., Class of 1917
inscribed: Inscribed verso, lower right and lower left, in graphite: 42

titles.title: Angels and a Male Figure in Clouds

makers.displaymaker: attributed to Antonio Zanchi, Este 1631–1722 Venice

displaymaker: attributed to Antonio Zanchi, Este 1631–1722 Venice
caption: Attributed to Antonio Zanchi (Este 1631–1722 Venice), Angels and a Male Figure in Clouds. Pen and brown ink and brush and brown wash heightened with white gouache, with possible corrections to drawing in white gouache, over black chalk, on tan lunette-shaped paper; 18.8 × 22.3 cm. Gift of Emily Townsend Vermeule, honorary degree holder of the Class of 1989 and Cornelius Clarkson Vermeule III, in memory of Alphaeus Hyatt Mayor, Class of 1922, George Rodney Meneely, Class of 1933, and Cornelius Clarkson Vermeule, Jr., Class of 1917 (1997-578)
